availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Catherine "Katie" Hidricks Funk (Meade County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Meade County, Kentucky, resident. Native of Germany. Married to John Funk. Mother of John Funk, Charles Funk, Mary Funk, Henry Funk, and Lizzie Funk. Resident of Meade County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, p. 469.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Meade County, Garnettsville, District 5, p. 374B.
Texas Death Certificates, 1903-1982, Bureau of Vital Statistics, Department of State Health Services, Austin, TX, File 35211.
"Lizzie Funk (1863-1863)," Find A Grave, Memorial 127491013, accessed September 13, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/127491013.
"Catherine “Kate” Funk (1831-1875)," Find A Grave, Memorial 106319638, accessed September 13, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/106319638.
